text:
[Verse]
Stepping out feet on the ground
Drops falling no one's around
Spin around laugh without fear
In the rain we're dancing here

[Verse 2]
Puddles splash joy in the air
Let the wind mess up our hair
Shoes soaked and hearts open wide
Find the rhythm side by side

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Feel the magic hold on tight
Every drop a beat so true
Let the storm dance me and you

[Verse 3]
Streetlights glow in water's gleam
Turning life into a dream
Smile bright under cloudy skies
Lost in moments time just flies

[Bridge]
Hear the thunder feel the beat
Raindrops tapping on the street
We don't care we'll never part
Raindance flows right from our heart

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Feel the magic hold on tight
Every drop a beat so true
Let the storm dance me and you
title: Dancing in the Rain
